class.name: franka_example_controllers_cyh/ElbowExampleController_cyh
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses and elbow to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_example_controllers_cyh/JointPositionExampleController_cyh
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint positions to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_example_controllers_cyh/JointVelocityExampleController_cyh
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on joint velocities to demonstrate correct usage

class.name: franka_example_controllers_cyh/CartesianPoseExampleController_cyh
class.description: A controller that executes a short motion based on cartesian poses to demonstrate correct usage
